item.title: Python Pandas API Oddities
item.description: Below I've highlighted some niche functions in Python's pandas library. I've plucked a few examples from the pandas documentation examples and the Delta Airlines Airports Wikipedia HTML table as an example. This post is aimed at the more advanced stuff on the fringes of the pandas docs. Here are some â€¦
